Assessment.QuestionText: You want to apply the font, <font face="courier new">Arial-15</font> with style as <font face="courier new">StrikeOut</font> to the text "This is richtextbox" inside the <font face="courier new">RichTextBox</font> control. Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
RichTextBox rtbExp = new RichTextBox();
FontFamily family = new FontFamily();
Font font = new Font(family, Strikeout);
rtbExp.Text = "This is richtextbox";
rtbExp.Font = font;

RichTextBox rtbExp = new RichTextBox();
FontFamily family = new FontFamily();
Font font = new Font(family, 15,Strikeout);
rtbExp.Text = "This is richtextbox";
font = rtbExp.Font;

RichTextBox rtbExp = new RichTextBox();
FontFamily family = new FontFamily("Arial");
Font font = new Font(family, 15, FontStyle.Strikeout);
rtbExp.Text = "This is richtextbox";
rtbExp.Font = font;

RichTextBox rtbExp = new RichTextBox();
FontFamily family = new FontFamily("Arial");
Font font = new Font(family, 15, FontStyle.Strikeout);
Text = "This is richtextbox";
Font = font;

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selection is: (C).
